title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 55.5 - Effective date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 55.5 - Effective date

State Regulations

This regulation shall take effect immediately and shall
apply to all passenger cars manufactured or assembled after January 1, 1968. These regulations shall take effect with respect to other motor vehicles when
the United States Department of Transportation, pursuant to the National

Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act, promulgates identical standards for such
vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
55.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
